channel.title: Qbittorrent on Bluepie's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Qbittorrent on Bluepie's Journal

item.title: How I replaced Netflix and using my media server for over 2 years now
item.description: Feasibility Can I host Netflix on my own? of course yes, many open source software offers similar functionality, you can set it to work only inside your home network or make it available throughout the internet. I already own a server, I rent out a server for hosting my development activities, so why not use that server as a media server, I don’t want it to run just inside the home LAN, I want it to be exposed to the internet, of course with required security measures.
